entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
